contentList.content: You've made a pact with a deathless being, a creature that defies the cycle and life and death, forsaking its mortal shell so it might eternally pursue its unfathomable ambitions.
This warlock made their pact with death itself, seeking to gain their patron's knowledge of how to break free from the cycle of life and death.

Having once been mortal themselves, these ancient undead know firsthand the paths of ambition and the routes past the doors of death. They eagerly share this profane knowledge, along with other secrets, with those who work their will among the living.
Your patron is an Archlich of great power, possessing forbidden knowledge and able to manipulate life and death forces.
Your patron is a ruthless Vampire Lord with exceptional dark powers, commanding an army of vampire spawns and other undead.
Your patron is a mysterious Eldritch Undead with incomprehensible motivation, wielding arcane forces beyond the ken of mortals.
Your patron is a vengeful Specter captive of the Material Plane, full of resentment and afflicted with a ravenous hunger for mortal life forces.
Your patron is a sentient Nightshade from the Plane of Shadow, master of death and shadows with extensive power over darkness.
Your patron, once a powerful and cunning high lord, was reanimated to serve as an undead guardian and now wields fearful ancient magic.

You can transform using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_FormOfDread">Form of Dread</LSTag> a number of times equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Once during each of your turns, when you hit a creature with an attack, you can force it to make a Wisdom saving throw, and if the saving throw fails, the target is frightened of you until the end of your next turn.
Force the creature to make a Wisdom saving throw, and if the saving throw fails, the target is frightened of you until the end of your next turn.
The target creature is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Manifest an aspect of your patron's dreadful power.

You gain [1] and are immune to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>. Once during each of your turns, when you hit a creature with an attack, you force it to make a Wisdom saving throw, and if the saving throw fails, the target is frightened of you until the end of your next turn.
Your patron's dreadful powers permeate your entire being, altering your appearance and emanating around you. Your life forces are vivified and you feel fearless.
Once during each of your turns, when you hit a creature with an attack and roll damage against the creature, you can replace the damage type with Necrotic damage.
While you are using your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_FormOfDread">Form of Dread</LSTag>, you can roll one additional damage die when determining the Necrotic damage the target takes.
Grave Touched: Form of Dread Extra Damage

Invoke the spirit of a large quasi-real, horselike creature equipped with a saddle, bit, and bridle. You or a creature you choose are imbued by the steed's spirit for the duration, or until you take damage.
Increase a creature's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> by [1] and double it's carrying capacity.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> increased by [1], and carry capacity is doubled. This buff ends if they take damage.

Your connection to undeath and necrotic energy now saturates your body. You have resistance to Necrotic damage. If you are transformed using your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_FormOfDread">Form of Dread</LSTag>, you instead become immune to Necrotic damage.

In addition, when you are reduced to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, you can use your reaction to regain [2] instead and cause your body to erupt with deathly energy. All enemies within [3] of you takes [1]. You are then <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="EXHAUSTED">Exhausted</LSTag>.
Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage.
Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Necrotic damage.

When you are reduced to 0 hit points, regain [2] and cause your body to erupt with deathly energy. All enemies within [3] of you wil take [1] + [4]. You will be affected with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="EXHAUSTED">Exhaustion</LSTag>.
Completing a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> reduces your exhaustion level by 1.
Select one of your Level 7 spells. Once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag> you can cast that spell without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
